emuInput.TitMainTitle: "Ideal Mother for 1957" Irene Lee surrounded by eight of her thirteen children and others in her home at 2514 Elba Street, Hill District
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper May 11, 1957, pg. A1, reads: "Ideal Mother - Mrs. Irene Lee, who typically represents the 'Ideal Mother for 1957,' is shown with eight of her 13 children and two grandchildren. Mrs. Lee is the proud mother of eight boys and five girls. The oldest will be 28, in August, and the youngest is 6. - Harris Photo."
